title: Audio output not switching Firefox audio
content: When switching between my audio outputs, everything changes to the correct output except Firefox. As far as I know I haven't changed anything.
creator: shanevwalton

title: Recuperar Sync
content: Atualizei a senha do Sync mas meus conteúdos não apareceram, mesmo usando o mesmo e-mail. Ajudem por favor.
creator: notoca

title: I set my homepage for any new tab I want to keep open through all sessions.  Since the latest update to v88, when I try to access my homepage in a new tab, multiple tabs open.  If I click the homepage again, more tabs open.  How to stop this?
content: Tell me how to rectify this problem. Thanks.
creator: mnosera
